MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Rowan Street and surrounding areas. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network on Rowan Street and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:00PM on Wednesday 27 January 2021.
